column2: rests in the arms of the Lord
has steadfastly fallen asleep in the Lord
was elevated to the heavenly mansion
has been grasped by honorable death
is eating white raisins in blissful Paradise
rides the white Camels of Paradise
is with the Houris in Paradise
was lifted up by the Valkyries
was lifted up by the Valkyries
has set course for the afterlife
has gone to join the ancestors
has gone to join the ancestors
